title: GST Appeals Update: Allahabad HC Disposes Cases, Extended Filing Till June 30, 2026, as GSTAT Operationalises
content:
# GST Appeals Update: Allahabad HC Disposes Cases, Extended Filing Till June 30, 2026, as GSTAT Operationalises

Ek important update hai! Government ne Goods and Services Tax Appellate Tribunal (GSTAT) ke functional hone ke baad GST appeals ki filing ke liye naye timelines announce kiye hain, aur isko dekhte hue Allahabad High Court ne pending appeals ko dispose kiya hai.

**What's New:**
*   Allahabad High Court ne GST appeals ko dispose kar diya hai, appellants ko June 30, 2026 tak GST Appellate Tribunal ke saamne appeal file karne ki permission di hai.
*   Yeh decision isliye liya gaya hai kyunki GST Appellate Tribunal (GSTAT) ab functional ho chuka hai (effective January 13, 2026).
*   **New Due Date:** Un orders ke against appeals, jo appellant ko April 1, 2026 se pehle communicate hue the, unhe ab June 30, 2026 tak file kiya ja sakta hai.
*   **Standard Due Date:** Agar order April 1, 2026 ya uske baad communicate hua hai, toh appeal us order ke communication date se teen mahine ke andar file karna hoga.

**Why this is important:**
Taxpayers ke liye yeh ek badi relief hai. GST Appellate Tribunal ke gathan mein delay ke karan high courts mein appeals ki pending cases kaafi badh gayi thi. Ab GSTAT ke operational hone aur appeal filing ke liye extended timeline milne se, businesses aur individuals ko apne pending disputes ko proper forum par challenge karne ka adequate time mil gaya hai.

Yeh update Central Goods and Services Tax Act, 2017 ke Section 112(1) ke तहत Ministry of Finance (Department of Revenue) dwara Notification No. S.O. 4220(E) dated September 17, 2025, ke through notify kiya gaya hai.
